Package com.entities

Class Payment

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.entities.Payment
  • @Entity
public class Payment
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a model class to hold payment information
    Version:
    1.0.
    Author:
    Victor Zenin
    See Also:
    Bank, Customer, Account

        Parameters:
        payment_ID - unique identificator of payment
        account - account from where spend money
        date - date of payment
        recipient - recipient of payment
        amount - amount of payment
        method - method of payment (0 - credit, 1 - debit)
        description - description of payment
        See Also:
        setPayment_ID(int), setAccount(Account), setDate(String), setRecipient(String), setAmount(double), setMethod(int), setDescription(String)
